data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reis, Emiliano De Angelis, Filho, Arlindo Serpa, Ferreira-Keppler, Ruth L. (2013): Two new species and records of Stenochironomus Kieffer from Brazilian Amazon region, with description of immature stages (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 3710 (5): 449-466, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.5.4
